daily_fact: A new trendy bagel shop is set to open in New Jersey, showcasing the beloved NYC bagel culture and bringing a taste of the city to its neighboring community.
topline_md: Recent updates in New York City include a salmon recall at BJ's stores due to listeria concerns, the first measles case linked to an unvaccinated infant, and a significant storm forecasted to bring snow this weekend, alongside ongoing discussions about housing and transportation policies under Mayor Mamdani.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Salmon sold at BJ's stores in NY, NJ recalled due to possible listeria contamination. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC reports first measles case in an unvaccinated infant who traveled overseas. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Black ice reported in Riverdale, Bronx; man hospitalized after falling and breaking ribs. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Seastreak ferry service disrupted as tugboat assists stuck ferry; Atlantic Highlands route canceled. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Uncertainty surrounds potential snowstorm affecting NYC this weekend; stay updated. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Fire at Staten Island home brought under control; no injuries reported. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Historic Jersey City Powerhouse declared "unstable structure"; safety measures in effect. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMickFVX3lxTE1ZSUczTTYyX0IyVHpEOFdtNHViWFNpZVhGYWZiel9hdXdNZWgybmMtNkxZRGw3TFQ1Z2UyWEJ2c1N6clBzNUowVXZzS2ZlaTVtMmRSYzMwdndLc1Mya0FiTVZGNFc0c0pqWENybkZGN25YQQ?oc=5)
